document_data.title: Lost in the Fog
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Lost in the Fog''''', designed by [[Timothy Bailey]], is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 4th-edition ruleset.

{{Quote|''As a deep fog blankets the Crown of the North, a fish gifts the adventurers with the chance to do a good deed. Returning lost property seems like an easy task. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in [[Waterdeep]] for characters levels 1-4.''|}}
